POLICY.alias: TODO: Submitter designated name for the 'Policy'. The name must be unique within the submission account.
POLICY.center_name: TODO: The center name (its acronym) of the submitter's account
POLICY.broker_name: TODO: The center name (its acronym) of the broker if applicable, if not, remove this attribute (broker_name)
POLICY.TITLE: TODO: Short text that can be used to call out data access policies in searches or in displays

DAC_REF.accession: TODO: Accession number of the DAC that this policy is associated with (DAC accessions start with EGAC...)
DAC_REF.refcenter: TODO: The center name (its acronym) of the submitter's account that created the DAC

POLICY.POLICY_TEXT: TODO: Text containing the policy. Use either this tag (POLICY_TEXT) or its alternative (POLICY_FILE)
POLICY.POLICY_FILE: TODO: File containing the policy text, to be accessed remotely (e.g. http://docs.icgc.org/portal/access/). Use either this tag (POLICY_FILE) or its alternative (POLICY_TEXT)

DATA_USE.code: TODO: Code of the Data Use Ontologies (DUO) related to the policy (e.g. 0000014). You can check yours at 'https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/duo', and read about DUO here: https://github.com/EBISPOT/DUO.
DATA_USE.version: TODO: Data Use Ontology code version (e.g. 2019-01-07)
DATA_USE.URL: TODO: Link to URL for the indicated DUO term (e.g. http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/DUO_0000014)

URL_LINK.LABEL: TODO: Optional text label to display for the link (e.g. ICGC Data Access Agreements)
URL_LINK.URL: TODO: Optional the internet service link (file:..., http:..., ftp:... etc.). In other words, the website address (e.g. http://www.icgc.org)

POLICY_ATTRIBUTE.TAG: TODO: Optional name of the custom attribute.
POLICY_ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: TODO: Optional value of the custom attribute.
